title.description: The title of the page or the post.

date.description: When this page or post was created.

date_updated.description: When this page or post was last updated.

summary.description: A short description of the page or post. This is used for the <meta> tags and social media previews.

tags.description: A space-separated list of tags for this page or post.

link.description: An external page that this page should link to, like a link blog. This is used on the HTML version of the page, and where clicking on the RSS feed entry will take the reader.

link_direct.description: Whether the articles index should link directly to the external page.

canonical_url.description: An external URL that is the canonical copy of this page, used for external posts I've copied to this site.

colors.description: Colours used to theme/style this individual page or post.

index.description: Affects how an individual page or post appears in the site-wide indexes.

exclude.description: Whether to exclude this post from the site-wide index.

feature.description: Whether to feature this article on the homepage

part_of.description: An anchor tag that describes what section of the site this is part of

url.description: The URL of the site section

nav_section.description: Which section of the site this page/post belongs to.

card_attribution.description: Any attribution information about the photo used for the card.

excerpt_separator.description: Unused except to suppress a Jekyll warning
